sources.title: A Wing and a Prayer | FULL MOVIE | 2015 | Documentary, WWII
sources.description:
Narrated by William Baldwin, the untold true story of WWII aviators who carried out a covert operation delivering weapons to the Israeli Army during the Arab-Israeli War to help prevent a second Holocaust.

Directed by Boaz Dvir
Starring William Baldwin, Al Schwimmer, Lou Lenart, Harold Livingston, Bill Novick, Gideon Lichtman, Phil Marmelstein, Pro. David Harman, Ralph Lowenstein, Sam Lewis
2015

metadata.Plot: An air-traffic controller (Claudia Christian) faces the challenge of her career when she is forced to guide a disabled airplane to safety, unaware that her husband is aboard.
metadata.Actors: Claudia Christian, Jeff Yagher, Jessica Tuck
